sentence: ), and in Missouri, everybodys flirting with the profoundly disturbing Eric Greitens, all while Herschel Walker remains functionally unopposed, history of domestic abuse be damned, apparently.
title: Hitler, But Dumber: The Vladimir Putin Story

sentence: While Herschel Walkers comments questioning evolution and reproductive medicine caught national attention this week, he also spoke Tuesday at the Rotary Club of Carrollton where he appeared to falsely suggest that NATO hasnt been involved in working to deter Russias invasion of Ukraine.
author: Greg Bluestein
title: Its not an autograph tour. Herschel Walkers GOP opponents rip their rival
